TextView.n1:text: Key specifications of Chevrolet Enjoy Ex-showroom Price New Delhi Rs 7,91,188 Mileage (ARAI) kmpl 18.2 kmpl Mileage (City) kmpl - Fuel Type Diesel Engine Displacement 1248 cc BHP 73.74bhp@4000rpm Torque 172.5Nm@1750rpm Technical specs of Chevrolet Enjoy All variants of the Chevrolet Enjoy are pretty much feature-laden and full of the expected technical specs. Enjoy Diesel engine specification include an engine of 1248cc, which musters up a torque measuring to 172.5Nm@1750rpm and maximum power of 73.74bhp@4000rpm. Enjoy top model coughs out an average or giving an overall mileage of around 9.1 kmpl, with a fuel efficiency within a city of 0.0 kmpl and on highways the mileage stands out as 18.2 kmpl.
